name: Kirn v. Glen Alden Corporation, Appellant

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Kirn v. Glen Alden Corporation, Appellant.
attorneys: Henry Thalenfeld, with him Franklin B. Celder, for appellant.

Roy N. LaRocca, Associate Counsel, with him Thomas E. Roberts, Chief Counsel, Raymond Kidman, Deputy Attorney General, and William C. Bennett, Attorney General, for State Workmen’s Insurance Fund, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kirn v. Glen Alden Corporation, Appellant.
Argued April 20, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Henry Thalenfeld, with him Franklin B. Celder, for appellant.
Joseph J. Cale, Jr., Special Counsel, with him William C. Sennett, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
Roy N. LaRocca, Associate Counsel, with him Thomas E. Roberts, Chief Counsel, Raymond Kidman, Deputy Attorney General, and William C. Bennett, Attorney General, for State Workmen’s Insurance Fund, appellee.
May 24, 1967:
